entry.title: The brave new world of surveillance
entry.content:
Today I found this excellent Flash animation on the "Metalab":http://www.metalab.at members mailing list, which may prove to be a great help in raising your non-techy friends awareness of privacy issues. Unfortunately it's in German only...

"http://www.trashhero.ch/redirect/1881.html":http://www.trashhero.ch/redirect/1881.html

Pungenday, Chaos 28, 3173 YOLD
